titleStmt.title: A discourse about the charge of novelty upon the reformed Church of England made by the papists asking of us the question, Where was our religion before Luther?
titleStmt.author: Hascard, Gregory.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Horn ... and Fincham Gardiner ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Gregory Hascard. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
